message: Welcome to Chatty! To get you started, let's check out the simple interface.
Type your message in the input box at the top of the page.
Press the send arrow or hit return/enter to send your message.
To delete your messages, select the message you wish to delete and press the trash icon.  You can also clear all messages with the trash icon next to the input box.
Spruce your messages up a bit by checking one or more of our themes!
